channel.title: Server logs in then instantly logs out
channel.description:
Alright, well the problem is; when I log into the server I automatically log out like instantly and it continues to log me out, the server is online and on port 43594 on which I have port forwarded. The error message I get is: Error:" T2 - 126,126,126 - 12,0,0 - 80,111,105,110,116,115,58,32,48,10,76,-59," That's from the Moparscape client. This is what the server command says. [Riotday] Connected - Game saved for player Riotday - [Riotday] Disconnected . I'm not sure of this problem and you're help would greatly be appreciated. I'm also using a 317 source, I've actually tried all types of sources.
Thanks, Riot

item.title: Server logs in then instantly logs out
item.dc:creator: @Riotday Riotday
item.description:
@Riotday wrote:

Well the only error on the moparscape client was Error: T2 - 126,-1,-1 - 18,0,0 - 67,111,109,98,97,116,32,76,101,118,101,108,58,32,51,10,78,-97,

Also using the pk splicescape source

Read full topic

Yes, it’s on, and it connects. Then instantly logs out…

Does it print anything out on the cmd box? like any errors?
